mapper.select: SELECT DATE(created_date) AS created_date, COUNT(*) AS board_count FROM board WHERE created_date >= CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 MONTH GROUP BY DATE(created_date) ORDER BY DATE(created_date) DESC;

SELECT YEAR(join_date) AS join_year, MONTH(join_date) AS join_month, COUNT(*) AS member_count FROM member WHERE join_date BETWEEN DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 6 MONTH) AND NOW() GROUP BY YEAR(join_date), MONTH(join_date) ORDER BY join_year ASC, join_month ASC;
SELECT g.grade_name, COUNT(m.member_no) AS member_count FROM member m INNER JOIN grade g ON m.grade_no = g.grade_no GROUP BY m.grade_no ORDER BY m.grade_no asc;
SELECT r.region_name, COUNT(rh.rental_home_no) AS rental_count FROM rental_home rh INNER JOIN region r ON rh.region_no = r.region_no GROUP BY rh.region_no ORDER BY rental_count desc;
